title: ðŸ“¬ Mailbag: Who will have better 2021: Trevor Lawrence or Joe Burrow? Who will finish with better career: Carson Wentz or Andy Dalton? (Football 8/2)
description:
Visit budlightlegends.com for your chance to win a free cooler!

*Note about this episode is that we recorded Thursday before Carson Wentz suffered a foot injury during Training Camp*
It's a Mailbag Monday for the Pick Six Superfriends. Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson and John Breech answer questions left by listeners as 5-star reviews on Apple Podcasts. Would the guys rather have Joe Burrow or Trevor Lawrence for this season? Would they rather have the career of Carson Wentz or Andy Dalton? Also, Bud Light Power Rankings and a much needed Ryan Finley tattoo update. 

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â 
You can listen to Pick Six on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast."
